Installations / Vibrant Splash Park In Mijas

Vibrant Splash Park In Mijas

Location: Costa Del Sol, Spain
Date: 13 January 2025
Application: water

Project Overview

Take a look at this vibrant splash park in Mijas, Costa del Sol, where Rosehill TPV® has been used to create a durable and safe surface for families to enjoy. Designed to cushion falls and reduce accident risks, our high-performance rubber flooring adds both functionality and fun to this public space.

Rosehill TPV® granules are UV-stable, ensuring they retain their vibrant colour and softness even in harsh climates and unpredictable weather. With 21 colours available, creating custom blends to bring unique designs to life has never been easier. A perfect long-lasting solution for safer, brighter splash parks and public spaces!

Thanks to VALORIZA ECORUBBER

Ready to Transform Your Space?

Contact us today to discuss how Rosehill TPV® can create safe, vibrant surfaces for your project.

Creating safer, more vibrant play and sports surfaces worldwide with our premium coloured rubber granules.
